article_title: House GOP Press Forward on Immigration Amid Budget Fight
comment_texts:
Most Americans are not paying attention to this issue. The Family reunification act will
bring in untold additional millions of immigrants into this country when the "Amnesty Immigration Reform bill" is passed by the Republican traitors in Congress. I have heard these politicians claim that many of the immigrants will be doing high tech jobs that few Americans are qualified to do. Yet the fact is the majority of the illegal immigrants who will be granted amnesty have very low education, and will be eligible for Obamacare; food stamps; low income housing; earned income tax credits, etc. It is a death sentence to to the US. Furthermore, amnesty attracts the flow more and more illegals into this country.
These Republicans are as corrupt as the Democrats, they are all in the pockets of big business.

explanation: The comment does not mention global warming.

The comment does not mention Trump.
The comment states that 'these Republicans are as corrupt as the Democrats, they are all in the pockets of big business.'
The comment states that 'these Republicans are as corrupt as the Democrats, they are all in the pockets of big business.'

The comment states that 'the Family reunification act will bring in untold additional millions of immigrants into this country', and 'amnesty attracts the flow more and more illegals into this country.'

The comment mentions that 'the majority of the illegal immigrants... will be eligible for Obamacare; food stamps; low income housing; earned income tax credits, etc.', implying that the commenter is against these services being provided to immigrants.
